quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Do not watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn’t take.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: We don’t make movies to make money, we make money to make more movies.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My unmatched perspicacity coupled with my sheer indefatigability makes me a feared opponent in any realm of human endeavor.
quotes.author: Andrew Tate

quotes.text: My unmatched perspicacity coupled s me a feared opponent in any realm of human endeavor.
quotes.author: Tate
